short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you paste images and files directly into file inputs on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows for you to paste images into places that will usually not allow you to paste images. 

Specifically, it allows for you to white list sites for where the extension turns on its code just for that website. It functions by detecting when you paste, and pasting that image into the first file input that it finds on the page. 

This is a use case for such things as using OCR websites that don't allow you to paste in images, or even using images.google.com! (to use images.google.com, you need to click on the camera first to gain access to the file input)
